type: Plus de 150 mots | La Gendarmerie royale du Canada (GRC) recherche des services d'architecture et d'ingénierie pour la mise en place d'installations fraîches au combat rapproché au Canada. La durée prévue de traitement du marché est de 1 440 jours. La marchandise ou le service conditionnellement réserve les entreprises autochtones. short_summary: Demande de propositions pour un consultant en architecture et ingénierie
description: Title: Architecture and Engineering Services for the Close Quarters Battlehouse (CQB) 100% Fresh Air Upgrades, Ottawa, Ontario.",
full_summary:
### Solicitation for Architecture and Engineering Services for the Close Quarters Battle House 100% Fresh Air Upgrades, Ottawa, Ontario

#### Solicitation Number: 202501511

#### Publication Date: 2024-11-06

#### Tender Closing Date and Time: 2024-12-02 14:00:00

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a multidisciplinary team of architects, engineers, and sub-consultants to provide design, engineering, and consulting services for the Close Quarters Battlehouse (CQB) 100% Fresh Air Upgrades in Ottawa, Ontario.

**Main Objectives:**

* Deliver 100% Fresh Air upgrades for the CQB in Ottawa
* Provide architectural and engineering services, including design, project management, and construction supervision

**Competition Strategy:**

* Competitive, open bidding process
* The award will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price

**Required Skills and Experience:**

* Architecture and engineering services for complex infrastructure projects
* Strong technical expertise in mechanical, electrical, and plumbing (MEP) engineering
* Proven experience in project management, design, and construction supervision

**Indigenous Business Opportunities:**

* In accordance with the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB), the federal government has conditionally set aside this procurement to promote Indigenous business participation
* Suppliers must self-identify as an Indigenous business and comply with PSIB requirements

**Geomarketing Requirements:**

* Goods and services must be supplied from within Canada
* The following regions are designated areas for the requirements:
	+ Canada
	+ Ottawa
	+ National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contact Information:**

* Contracting Authority: Anne-Marie Doyle
* Email: [Anne-Marie.Doyle@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:Anne-Marie.Doyle@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 204 430-1090

**Attachments:**

* Request for Proposal (RFP) document
* Project Brief
* Security Guide
* Bid forms and special instructions

Please note that all documents must be submitted electronically through the GETS service provider on the Government of Canada Web site at [http://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders](http://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders).

Kindly ensure to consult regularly with the Service électronique d'appels d'offres du gouvernement (SEAOG) for the latest
